name: You Know The Drill
description:
After 2 years without participating, we're back for our 4th Ludum Dare !

Synopsis

You travel from planet to planet in search of a "planet heart" a mineral that is supposed to make you rich enough for multiple lifetimes.

Upgrade your equipment to dig deeper and find the planet heart.

Controls

- A/D: Move left/right

- E: Interact

- Space: Jump/Use jetpack

- Left Mouse Button: Dig block

Credits

Programming

- Maksime

- Metalfox

- Youhou

Music & Sound

- Maksime
